import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { API } from '../../../../config' import Footer from '../../Footer' import Navbar from '../../Navbar' const Cart = () => { const cart_items = useSelector(state=> state.cart.cart_items ) const cart_totals = cart_items?.map(item=> item.product_price * item.quantity) const total_amount = cart_totals.length>0 && cart_totals.reduce((a, b)=> a + b) return ( <>

Cart Items

{cart_items.length > 0 ? { cart_items && cart_items.map((item, i)=> { return }) }
S.No. Prodct Image Product Name Unit Price Quantity Total Price Action
{i + 1} {item.product_name} Rs. {item.product_price}
button
{item.quantity} 		Rs. {item.quantity * item.product_price}

}
) } export default Cart
